name: Pregnant Merri Mini-game
description:
NOTE: Contains belly expansion fetish content.

Hello! Here's a little project I made as a gift to the artist, SqwarkDemon. It features his reindeer girl OC Merri in an outfit based on DDLC, who has sudden, inexplicable pregnant belly expansion. There's an option on the first screen to toggle between standard and hyper pregnancy sizes.

Check out Sqwark's DeviantArt page: https://www.deviantart.com/sqwarkdemon

Controls:

R to restart
Space to increase belly size
Backspace to decrease belly size

That's about it! I might add to this someday.
